sub_title: Employee & Client Relations | Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging | Project Management | Event planning | Keynote Speaker
summary:
Passionate, enthusiastic, hard worker and an optimistic person are the words to describe me. I am committed to working, and spreading awareness for people of determination. At the same time I am passionate to create, divine, develop and implement employee well-being and other employee related programs and policies.

This passion comes from my own experience as a person of determination; when I was 14 years old, all of a sudden I became paralyzed from my hips to my toes. After this, I spent 7 years looking for a diagnosis, on and off in a wheelchair has changed my perspective in life. Five years ago, I got diagnosed with EDS. I decided that only my mindset could change the situation and spend many years working on myself. 

Years later, I made a bold move, and moved from my home country, The Netherlands, to Dubai and started working in the world's first and  largest rehabilitation and education center for people of determination. I am fulfilling the role of Global Inclusion Ambassador and in this way I try to create a difference for the children in our center, by involving them into wider society. But also, by spreading more awareness in general, it's not only our children of determination who need to learn how to adapt to the wider world, but mostly us in the wider world to adapt to the people of determination. Within my role as a Global Inclusion Ambassador I am also responisble for setting up a sponsorship program, communicate and maintain relationships with clients and develop more employee well-being programs.

Next to this I am available as a keynote speaker for both online and real-life events, in this way I want to create more awareness around the topic by telling my story in an impactful way. Feel free to contact me by writing me a personal message.

''When ''I'' is replaced by ''we'', even Ilness, becomes wellness.'' - Malcom X

#keynotespeaker #inclusion #ambassador #opentoconnect #letsconnect

profile_positions.description: In Ghana I have volunteered at an orphanage with a lot of passion. My daily tasks were: teaching English language to the children, helping build a better facility and refurbishing it, creating a shop and open a small farm. This all to establish a more sustainable and independent way of living.
